client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of your OAuth application

client_secret.title: Client Secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of your OAuth application.

access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: Access Token for making authenticated requests.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: Refresh Token to obtain new Access Token, when it's expired.

start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Zendesk Chat API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z.

subdomain.title: Subdomain
subdomain.description: Required if you access Zendesk Chat from a Zendesk Support subdomain.
